duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and support highly complex, cross-functional, multi-operational business solutions within loan operations.
Manage budgets, including reallocating funds as priorities shift and develop financial and resource plans.
Develop career progression material and lead a team focused on loan processing, quality review, collateral management, loan servicing, and records management.
Ensure optimized processes and controls within loan operations and monitor performance metrics for efficiency and timely completion of workload.
Serve as an internal escalation point for troubleshooting complex loan operational issues and contribute to the development of business strategies and goals.
Communicate departmental leadership vision/strategy and manage people and technology to follow that direction.
Define, deliver, and support strategic plans for implementing information technologies and bring industry leading best practices to the attention of the leadership team.
Develop and leverage partnerships with internal stakeholders to meet business needs and understand and comply with bank policy, laws, regulations, and the bank's BSA/AML Program.
Carry out supervisory responsibilities in accordance with the organization’s policies and applicable laws.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent related work or military experience 6 years of relevant experience 3 years of previous supervisory and/or management experience
